title: Mod Manifest Schema
description: Defines the structure of a mod.manifest.json file for the Living Narrative Engine.

id.description: Unique identifier for the mod (must match its folder name under mods/).

version.description: Semantic version of the mod (SemVer: major.minor.patch[-prerelease][+build]).

name.description: Human-readable display name for the mod.

description.description: Brief summary of what the mod does.

author.description: Author or team that created the mod.

dependencies.description: Mods this mod depends on. If omitted, there are no dependencies.

conflicts.description: IDs of mods that are incompatible with this mod.

gameVersion.description: Game engine version or SemVer range this mod supports.

content.description: Mapping of content categories to lists of JSON definition files included in this mod.

contentFileList.description: Array of relative paths (forward slashes) to .json definition files for a specific content type. Paths must not start with '/' or include '..'.

items.description: Relative path to a definition file, e.g. "items/iron_sword.json".

dependency.description: Declares a dependency on another mod.

required.description: If false, the dependency is optional. Defaults to true.
